document.full_text: divisions at the u.s. federal reserve over how soon to reverse course on monetary policy emerged more clearly last month, although the central bank appeared intent to complete a $600 billion bond-buying plan.
document.title: minutes show fed split over timing of policy exit
lines_and_colors: divisions at the u.s. federal reserve over how soon to reverse course on monetary policy emerged more clearly last month, although the central bank appeared intent to complete a $600 billion bond-buying plan.
